name: Breaking The Bottle
description:
Are you under stress and tired of life?

Throw an dagger to break bottles over the rack,
and you will be surely relaxed from stress.

Feel free from stress for 60 seconds.

If you break a lot of bottles or get a high score,
then you will be ranked on the leader board.

* Movie : http://youtu.be/kLgCb-AAWW0
